verses.verse: Therefore<WG5124> seeing<WG1223> we have<WG2192> this<WG3778> ministry,<WG1248> even as<WG2531> we obtained mercy,<WG1653> we don't<WG3756> faint.<WG1573>

But<WG235> we have renounced<WG550> the hidden things<WG2927> of shame,<WG152> not<WG3361> walking<WG4043> in<WG1722> craftiness,<WG3834> nor<WG3366> handling<WG1389> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> deceitfully;<WG1389> but<WG235> by the manifestation<WG5321> of the truth<WG225> commending<WG4921> ourselves<WG1438> to<WG4314> every<WG3956> man<WG444>'s conscience<WG4893> in the sight of<WG1799> God.<WG2316>
<WG1161> Even<WG2532> if<WG1487> our<WG2257> Good News<WG2098> is<WG2076> veiled,<WG2572> it is<WG2076> veiled<WG2572> in those<WG3588> who<WG2076> perish;<WG622>

in<WG1722> whom<WG3739> the god<WG2316> of this<WG5127> world<WG165> has blinded<WG5186> <WG1519> the minds<WG3540> of the unbelieving,<WG571> that<WG3361> the light<WG5462> of the Good News<WG2098> of the glory<WG1391> of Christ,<WG5547> who<WG3739> is<WG2076> the image<WG1504> of God,<WG2316> should not dawn<WG826> on them.<WG846>

For<WG1063> we don't<WG3756> preach<WG2784> ourselves,<WG1438> but<WG235> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> as Lord,<WG2962> and<WG1161> ourselves<WG1438> as your<WG5216> servants<WG1401> for<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424>' sake;

seeing<WG3754> it is God<WG2316> who<WG3739> said,<WG2036> "Light<WG5457> will shine<WG2989> out of<WG1537> darkness,<WG4655>" who has shone<WG2989> in<WG1722> our<WG2257> hearts,<WG2588> to<WG4314> give the light<WG5462> of the knowledge<WG1108> of the glory<WG1391> of God<WG2316> in<WG1722> the face<WG4383> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>

But<WG1161> we have<WG2192> this<WG5126> treasure<WG2344> in<WG1722> clay<WG3749> vessels,<WG4632> that<WG2443> the exceeding greatness<WG5236> of the power<WG1411> may be<WG5600> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> not<WG3361> from<WG1537> ourselves.<WG2257>
We are pressed<WG2346> on<WG1722> every side,<WG3956> yet<WG235> not<WG3756> crushed;<WG4729> perplexed,<WG639> yet<WG235> not<WG3756> to despair;<WG1820>
pursued,<WG1377> yet<WG235> not<WG3756> forsaken;<WG1459> struck down,<WG2598> yet<WG235> not<WG3756> destroyed;<WG622>

always<WG3842> carrying<WG4064> in<WG1722> the body<WG4983> the putting to death<WG3500> of the Lord<WG2962> Jesus,<WG2424> that<WG2443> the life<WG2222> of Jesus<WG2424> may also<WG2532> be revealed<WG5319> in<WG1722> our<WG2257> body.<WG4983>

For<WG1063> we<WG2249> who live<WG2198> are always<WG104> delivered<WG3860> to<WG1519> death<WG2288> for<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424>' sake,<WG2443> that the life<WG2222> also<WG2532> of Jesus<WG2424> may be revealed<WG5319> in<WG1722> our<WG2257> mortal<WG2349> flesh.<WG4561>
So then<WG5620> death<WG2288><WG99999> works<WG1754> in<WG1722> us,<WG2254> but<WG1161> life<WG2222> in<WG1722> you.<WG5213>

But<WG2249> having<WG2192> the same<WG846> spirit<WG4151> of faith,<WG4102> according to that<WG2596> which is written,<WG1125> "I believed,<WG4100> and therefore<WG1352> I spoke.<WG2980>" We<WG4100> also<WG2532> believe,<WG4100> and<WG2532> therefore<WG1352> also we speak;<WG2980>

knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> he who<WG3588> raised<WG1453> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> will raise<WG1453> us<WG2248> also<WG2532> with<WG1223> Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> will present<WG3936> us with<WG4862> you.<WG5213>

For<WG1063> all things<WG3956> are for<WG1223> your sakes,<WG5209> that<WG2443> the grace,<WG5485> being multiplied<WG4121> through<WG1223> the many,<WG4119> may<WG4052> cause the thanksgiving<WG2169> to abound<WG4052> to<WG1519> the glory<WG1391> of God.<WG2316>

Therefore we don't<WG3756> faint,<WG1573> but<WG235> though<WG1487> <WG2532> our<WG2257> outward<WG1854> man<WG444> is decaying,<WG235> yet our<WG2257> inward<WG2081> man<WG444> is renewed<WG341> day<WG2250> by<WG2532> day.<WG2250>

For<WG1063> our<WG2257> light<WG1645> affliction,<WG2347> which is for the moment,<WG3910> works<WG2716> for us<WG2254> <WG2596> more and<WG5236> more<WG1519> exceedingly<WG5236> an eternal<WG166> weight<WG922> of glory;<WG1391>

while we<WG2257> don't<WG3361> look<WG4648> at the things<WG3588> which are seen,<WG991> but<WG235> at the things<WG3588> which are<WG991> not<WG3361> seen.<WG991> For<WG1063> the things<WG3588> which are seen<WG991> are temporal,<WG4340> but<WG1161> the things<WG3588> which are<WG991> not<WG3361> seen<WG991> are eternal.<WG166>
